participant_1.background:
My family is the most important thing in my life.
my parents have been married for 40 years.
i am fascinated with ghosts.
i drink beers and go to the creek.
I enjoy strong female characters in my movies.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my brother for achieving his dream of playing football in the NFL.
i am writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.
I want to learn Swedish so I can be more comfortable in Sweden.
I enjoy hiking because it allows me to connect with nature and my spiritual side.
i study philosophy at umass.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do?
I love hiking. It allows me to connect with nature and my spiritual side.
I wish I could hike more often! I do enjoy it.
Where is your favorite place to hike?
I love hiking in the Smoky Mountains. I have been going there since I was a little kid.
I have heard that the Smoky Mountains are beautiful. I have never been there before.
You should definitely go! There are so many great hiking trails.
I will have to check it out sometime! What other hobbies do you have?
I love to read and watch movies. I am also fascinated with ghosts.
I love to read too! I am reading a novel about a woman who is trying to find her missing husband.
Oh, that sounds interesting. I love a good mystery.
It is really good! I am enjoying it so far.
I am glad to hear that! What are some of your favorite movies?
I love movies with strong female characters. I also love action movies.
I love action movies too! I recently watched a movie about a group of people who are trying to save the world from an alien invasion.
That sounds like a great movie! I will have to check it out.
